dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description: The free and opensource java implementation
dependencies.name: java

dependent_to.description:
pharokka is a rapid standardised annotation pipeline for bacteriophage
genomes
dependent_to.name: pharokka

description:
MinCED is a program to find Clustered Regularly Interspaced Short
Palindromic Repeats (CRISPRs) in full genomes or environmental datasets
such as metagenomes, in which sequence size can be anywhere from 100 to
800 bp.
name: minced

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
